name: Ralf
description:
An unlikely hero. An epic journey. In search of one thing ... his lost ball ?!? Ralf heads out searching for his ball and unwittingly becomes a hero!

Ralf is a 2D Platformer featuring 19 levels of side scrolling action with collectables hidden throughout every level. Casual players will enjoy the ease of play in this cartoon like game while more advanced gamers will be challenged to get 100% completion and unlock all 25 achievements.

Help Ralf rescue his friends, collect the 6 rainbow keys, save the sick Blobbers and, of course, find his lost ball!
